message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.CL, cs.CR, cs.DS

This paper deals with extending logic programming to capture causal relations, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the semantics of the extended syntax, which is related to Logic (cs.LO). Additionally, the paper uses examples from Knowledge Representation (cs.CL) to illustrate the concepts. The paper also deals with non-monotonicity, which is a topic in Cryptography (cs.CR) and Data Structures (cs.DS).
